--- Lokk / Axis / Lynxiz ---

Lynxiz quickly flattens herself to the ground, avoiding most of the 
wildly fired shots though in her dodging efforts, several bullets dug 
into her armour, and glanced off of her back. She stays on the 
ground, and notices Nightlight being approached by Depp. A 
growing sense of doom builds as she gets to her feet and fires two 
disks at Depp. Immediately after firing the disks, she puts her gun 
away and starts to sprint towards Depp thinking, <<I can't let this 
happen...>> as she prepares for close combat mode. Her claws 
extend from her hands with a metallic ringing. 

Axis, not sure what to do, waits behind the pod, hoping that the 
heavy heat resistant re-entry armour on the pod will hold out for this 
battle. Without looking, he yells, "LOKK?" Wanting to make sure 
that Lokk is ok.

Lokk creaps around, weaving through trees. Exiting the forest, he 
hids behind a near by rock. Keeping low to the ground, he crawls 
along still trying to get behind the enemy and he's almost there.
